definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: “Science can only help in so many ways, ” Clark says.
sentences.chinese: 科學僅能在如此少的方向中幫上忙。

sentences.english: Allow me to paint you a London in detail.
sentences.chinese: 請讓我在等待中幫你們描繪一幅工筆的倫敦。
